https://tmrev.io/movie/174368-Dancing in Jaffa 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/4mZrZfm2HpiDq6tclVYdEgUj8Ce.jpg Pierre Dulaine, an internationally renowned ballroom dancer, is starting to fulfill his life long dream - to take his program Dancing Classrooms to Jaffa, where he was born. He is teaching 10-year-old Israeli-Palestinian and Israeli-Jewish children to dance together. Pierre recognizes that the future is built by children. By breaking the syndrome of hatred, he will change their lives, and hopefully, the community around them. Dancing in Jaffa
